Graph Learning Utilities¶

Get Nodal Coordinates¶

graph_learning.utils.getEllipticalCoordinates()¶

Obtain the node coordinates

Returns

pos – A dictionary including the 2D coordinates for each node

Return type

dict

Plot Multi-Channel Signal Window¶

graph_learning.utils.plotMultiChannelSignals(X, Fs)¶

Plots the given multi-channel window

Parameters

  • X (array) – Multi-channel window of shape (numChannels, numSamples)

  • Fs (float) – Sampling freqency in Hertz
